words.sentence_translated: Good evening, I see your cat.

words.sentence: Ik zag dat het mislukt was.
words.sentence_translated: I saw that it had failed.

words.word_translated: Danil (adjective form used for describing something characteristic of Danil, e.g., 'Danil-like')

words.sentence: Ik ben bezig met de kat.
words.sentence_translated: I am busy with the cat.

words.word_translated: please (a polite way to make a request)
words.sentence: Alstublieft, help me met de kat.
words.sentence_translated: Please, help me with the cat.

words.word_translated: always (at all times or on every occasion)
teenager (a young person in the process of developing from a child into an adult)
words.sentence: De puber is bezig met zijn kat.
words.sentence_translated: The teenager is busy with his cat.

words.word_translated: little pet (a small animal kept for companionship)
words.sentence: De puber heeft een petje, een kat.
words.sentence_translated: The teenager has a little pet, a cat.
